articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
In partnership with @eth_barcelona, we are giving away 3 FREE tickets to attend ETH Barcelona, each worth $499 🤩🪅
Here's how to enter 👇
1. Retweet this tweet along with a short message saying why you want to go 
2. Tag a friend 
See you in Spain! 🇪🇸
ETHBarcelona: Come meet the movers & shakers of the crypto world at Spain’s first Ethereum conference.🇪🇸
3 days of talks, music and festival vibes in the center of #Barcelona 🤩
Come see what the future looks like at this amazing event.🥳
🎟 Get your tickets today at
 http://ethbarcelona.com

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Work opportunity signal boost for an amazing team building an amazing product!! 🚀🚀🚀
Lonis.sol/eth: Great to partner w @matthuang @paradigm @jordancooper @PaceCap et al on a $5M seed!
At Dework, we're building Dework using Dework! We only have 3 core team members - but 5-6 flexible contributors building Dework with us, on their own terms. If that sounds interesting, DMs open!
 https://twitter.com/deworkxyz/status/1532018865647001600
articles.title: Work opportunity signal boost for an amazing team building an amazing product!! 🚀🚀🚀

Thank you to everyone who got me here!
